name: Boyfriend
description: Known as Boyfriend.xml, he is a really known rapper that fought against a lot characters, involving exeller, he also has a girlfriend that usually stay with him.

name: Tails
description: Miles Tails Power is a 9 years old fox that loves mechanic, he helps sonic a lot while defeating eggman or other villains, he is also known for his high IQ.

name: Knuckles
description: Protector of the Master Emerald, he is an 15 years old echidna, he seems serious and mean but in reality he is a really naive character.

name: Dr.Eggman
description: He was known for calling him self Doctor Ivo but after an experiment with sonic that went bad, he adapted his villain and mean version of him.

name: Amy
description: Amy Rose is an hedgehog that has 13 years old, she had 9 years old before but she used one of Sally’s machine to grow up and she became what she is today.

name: Cream
description: Cream The Rabbit is an 6 years old children, she is a really shy and lovely person, she also have a friend called Cheese that she loves so much.

name: Sally
description: Queen of mobius, she is 16 but still a really known queen, she also have a bracelet that give her 5 powers that are: Earth, Water, Fire, Wind and Electricity.

name: Exeller
description: You don’t need to have information about this character Yet.
